aiGenerate.title: AI Generate
aiGenerate.inputPrompt: Describe the test case you want to generate...
aiGenerate.generatingWarning: Generation in progress. Leaving will lose all conversation content!
aiGenerate.placeholder: Describe the test case you want to generate...
aiGenerate.placeholderApi:
Describe API test requirements, it is recommended to provide detailed API information for accurate query:
‚Ä¢ API category (e.g., User Authentication, Resource Management, Data Query, etc.)
‚Ä¢ API tag or name (e.g., Create User, Get List, etc.)
‚Ä¢ API path (e.g., /api/v1/users)
‚Ä¢ Validation requirements (e.g., required fields, return values, etc.)
aiGenerate.placeholderE2e:
Describe business flow test requirements, it is recommended to include complete business scenarios:
‚Ä¢ Business scenario description (e.g., User registration and login flow)
‚Ä¢ Preconditions (e.g., Whether login is required, initialize data, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Business steps (e.g., Create resource ‚Üí Modify resource ‚Üí Query resource ‚Üí Delete resource)
‚Ä¢ Expected results (e.g., Process completes normally, data is created and cleaned up correctly)
aiGenerate.pageSubtitle: Describe requirements in natural language, AI automatically generates complete test cases
aiGenerate.generatingAlert: AI is generating test cases. Do not refresh or leave this page, or all conversation content will be lost!
aiGenerate.emptyDescription: Use natural language to describe test requirements. The more detailed API information (such as category, tags, name, path) you provide, the easier it is for AI to accurately query and generate test cases
aiGenerate.example1Text: User login API, path: /api/v1/auth/login, category: User Authentication, verify username and password are required, successfully returns token
aiGenerate.example2Text: Create resource API, path: /api/v1/resources, tag: Resource Management, verify required fields and data format, successfully returns resource ID
aiGenerate.example3Text: Query list API, name: Get user list, path: /api/v1/users, category: Data Query, supports pagination parameters (page, pageSize), verify return data structure
aiGenerate.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
aiGenerate.autoAddedAssertions: Automatically added required field validation assertions
aiGenerate.autoAddedStatusCheck: Automatically added response status code check
aiGenerate.autoGeneratedScenarios: Generated normal and exception scenario test cases

settings.title: Settings
settings.pageDescription: Manage global configurations that will be applied to all API test executions

environment.title: Environment Configuration
environment.description: Configure the base URL for the test environment. All API node URLs will be automatically prefixed with this address
environment.baseUrlHint: Example: https://api.example.com, API node paths will be automatically appended to this address

authToken.title: Authentication Token Configuration
authToken.description: Configure authentication token. All API requests will automatically include this header
authToken.headerKeyHint: Header key name, common examples: Authorization, X-Auth-Token, etc.
authToken.tokenValueHint: Full token value, e.g.: Bearer abc123xyz

session.title: Session Mode Configuration
session.description: Configure login API to automatically obtain session for subsequent API requests
session.cookiesHint: üí° All cookies are automatically saved and will be included in subsequent API requests

ai.title: ‚ú® AI Smart Generation Configuration
ai.description: Configure AI large model for intelligent test case generation
ai.providerHint: Select the AI service provider you want to use
ai.modelHint: Enter model name, e.g.: gpt-4-turbo-preview, deepseek-chat, etc.
ai.apiKeyHint: API Key will be encrypted and stored securely
ai.baseUrlHint: Modify this if using a proxy or custom endpoint
ai.temperatureHint: Higher values = more random, lower values = more deterministic. Recommended: 0.7
ai.maxTokensHint: Controls the maximum length of generated content. Recommended: 4000

toast.loadFailedDesc: Unable to load platform settings. Please check your network connection or refresh the page

toast.aiTestSuccessDesc: AI service is configured correctly and ready to use

nodePalette.title: Node Palette

nodeConfig.apiNodeDescription: Configure API request parameters, response extraction and assertion rules
nodeConfig.parallelNodeDescription: Configure multiple APIs to execute in parallel, suitable for preparation or cleanup
nodeConfig.waitNodeDescription: Configure wait time or wait conditions
nodeConfig.queryParamsDesc: Configure URL query parameters, supports fixed values and variable references
nodeConfig.noParams: This API has no request parameters
nodeConfig.expectedResponseDesc: All response parameters will be automatically extracted as variables and can be referenced in subsequent steps.
nodeConfig.referenceExample3: Use dot notation for nested objects:
nodeConfig.cleanupNodeDesc: When enabled, this node will execute after all other nodes complete, regardless of whether previous nodes succeed or fail. Mainly used for cleaning up test data

apiSelector.title: Select API Interface
apiSelector.description: Select an interface from API repository to add to orchestration flow
apiSelector.searchPlaceholder: Search API name, path or description...

parallelConfig.nodeDescPlaceholder: Describe the purpose of this parallel node
parallelConfig.stopAll: Stop all if any API fails
parallelConfig.stopAllDesc: If any API fails, cancel other running APIs
parallelConfig.continueAllDesc: Even if some APIs fail, others will continue to execute
parallelConfig.clickToAdd: Click 'Add API' button above to start
parallelConfig.queryParamsDesc: üí° Query parameters will be auto-filled during execution
parallelConfig.noBodyConfig: This API has no request body configuration
parallelConfig.expectedResponseDesc: All response parameters will be automatically extracted as variables and can be referenced in subsequent steps.
parallelConfig.note1: All APIs will start executing simultaneously, not in sequence
parallelConfig.note2: Suitable for independent API calls, such as setup or cleanup
parallelConfig.note3: Can significantly improve test execution efficiency
parallelConfig.note4: Each API result can be referenced individually in subsequent nodes

waitConfig.title: Wait Settings
waitConfig.maxWaitTimeDesc: Stop waiting after this time, default 30 seconds
waitConfig.checkIntervalDesc: How often to check the condition, default 2 seconds
waitConfig.variableTip: üí° Tip: In API nodes use field name directly (e.g.
waitConfig.variableTip2: ), in standalone wait nodes use full path (e.g.

assertionConfig.title: Assertion Settings
assertionConfig.stopOnFailureDesc: When an assertion fails, stop executing subsequent assertions immediately
assertionConfig.continueAllDesc: Even if an assertion fails, continue executing remaining assertions
assertionConfig.clickToAdd: Click 'Add Assertion' to create validation rules
assertionConfig.expectedTypeDesc: Set expected value data type, e.g. string "200" vs number 200

testCaseList.title: Test Case List
testCaseList.name: Name

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.executionTrendDescription: Test execution statistics for the last 30 days

auth.loginDescription: Login to AI TestMind to start your testing journey
auth.registerDescription: Join AI TestMind for intelligent testing experience
auth.platformDescription: AI TestMind is a next-generation AI-driven visual API test orchestration platform that makes test case creation, management, and execution unprecedentedly simple.
auth.feature1Desc: Browser extension + HAR import dual-mode, automatically captures all API requests, zero configuration for rapid test case library construction
auth.feature2Desc: Conversational test case generation, AI automatically understands business requirements, intelligently orchestrates complex test flows
auth.feature3Desc: Drag-and-drop flowchart design, supports conditional judgment, parallel execution, loops and other complex scenarios
auth.feature4Desc: Real-time execution status, complete log recording, accurate problem location, supports assertions and variable extraction
auth.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

users.title: User Management
users.createDescription: Fill in user information to create a new account
users.editDescription: Modify user information, leave password empty to keep unchanged
users.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete user {username}? This action cannot be undone.
